From: anil@bnminternational.com <mailto:anil@bnminternational.com>  <anil@bnminternational.com <mailto:anil@bnminternational.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 6:46 PM
To: Cherry Ramirez <C.Ramirez@emaar.ae <mailto:C.Ramirez@emaar.ae> >
Cc: Ibtihal Sara Mirdan <I.Mirdan@emaar.ae <mailto:I.Mirdan@emaar.ae> >; subin@bnminternational.com <mailto:subin@bnminternational.com> ; 'Milovan Micevic' <Milovan.Micevic@chalhoub.com <mailto:Milovan.Micevic@chalhoub.com> >; 'Nidheesh RS' <nidheesh@bnminternational.com <mailto:nidheesh@bnminternational.com> >; yoonus@bnminternational.com <mailto:yoonus@bnminternational.com> 
Subject: TUMI Dubai Mall- Permit

 

Dear Cherry, 

 

I hope this email finds you well! 

 

We recently applied for a minor work permit under RRD to replace the existing signage and glass panel at the newly opened temporary TUMI shop at GF 335. However, our application was rejected with a note mentioning to share a valid insurance documentation.

 

I have attached our CAR insurance policy to this email, which is valid until December. This document was also uploaded with our initial permit application.

We recently applied for a minor work permit under RRD to replace the existing signage and glass panel at the newly opened temporary TUMI shop at GF 335. However, our application was rejected with a note mentioning to share a valid insurance documentation.

 

I have attached our CAR insurance policy to this email, which is valid until December. This document was also uploaded with our initial permit application.

Could you please assist us in resolving this issue? We are eager to proceed with the work and would greatly appreciate your guidance on obtaining the necessary permit as soon as possible.

 

Regards
